Teneva hi vivecetabbānaṃ vivecanākārassa ca bhedato bahuvidhattā te ekattena gahetvā ‘‘paviveka’’nti ekavacanena vuttaṃ. ^b^Dukkaraṃ paviveka^eb^nti vā pavivekaṃ kattuṃ na sukhanti attho. ^b^Ekībhāve^eb^ti ekattabhāve. ^b^Dvayaṃdvayārāmo^eb^ti dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ bhāvābhirato. ^b^Haranti viyā^eb^ti saṃharanti viya vighātuppādanena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ghasanti viyā’’^eb^ti. Bhayasantāsuppādanena khādituṃ āgatā yakkharakkhasapisācādayo viyāti adhippāyo. ^b^Īdisassā^eb^ti aladdhasamādhino. ^b^Tiṇapaṇṇamigādisaddehī^eb^ti vāteritānaṃ tiṇapaṇṇādīnaṃ migapakkhiādīnañca bhīsanakehi bheravehi saddehi. ^b^Vividhehi ca^eb^ aññehi khāṇuādīhi ^a^V3.0327^ea^ yakkhādiākārehi upaṭṭhitehi ^b^bhīsanakehi^eb^. Ghaṭena kīḷā ^b^ghaṭikā^eb^ti eke. Dasamaṃ uttānameva.

[03]^b^101-112^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiyassa ^a^V3.0328^ea^^a^M3.0353^ea^ paṭhamādīni uttānāni. Chaṭṭhe ^b^nijjarakāraṇānī^eb^ti pajahanakāraṇāni. Imasmiṃ maggo kathīyatīti katvā ^b^‘‘ayaṃ heṭṭhā…pe… puna gahitā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi nijjiṇṇā micchādiṭṭhīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Yathā micchādiṭṭhi vipassanāya nijjiṇṇāpi na samucchinnāti samucchedappahānadassanatthaṃ puna gahitā, evaṃ micchāsaṅkappādayopi vipassanāya pahīnāpi asamucchinnatāya idha puna gahitāti ayamattho ‘‘micchāsaṅkappassā’’tiādīsu sabbapadesu vattabboti dasseti ^b^‘‘evaṃ sabbapadesu yojetabbo’’^eb^ti iminā. ^b^Ettha cā^eb^ti ‘‘sammāvimuttipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantī’’ti etasmiṃ pāḷipade. Ettha ca samucchedavasena ca paṭippassaddhivasena ca paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ sammadeva vimuccanaṃ ^b^sammāvimutti^eb^. Tappaccayā ca maggaphalesu aṭṭha indriyāni bhāvanāpāripūriṃ upagacchantīti maggasampayuttānipi saddhādīni indriyāni uddhaṭāni. Maggavasena hi phalesu bhāvanāpāripūrī nāmāti. ^b^Abhinandanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti ativiya sinehanaṭṭhena. Idañhi somanassindriyaṃ ukkaṃsagatasātasabhāvato sampayuttadhamme sinehantaṃ tementaṃ viya pavattati. ^b^Pavattasantatiādhipateyyaṭṭhenā^eb^ti vipākasantānassa jīvane adhipatibhāvena. ^b^Eva^eb^ntiādi vuttasseva atthassa nigamanaṃ. Sattamādīni uttānatthāni.

[03]^b^113-6^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyassa ^a^V3.0329^ea^ paṭhamadutiyāni uttānatthāni. ^b^Tatiye jānaṃ jānātī^eb^ti sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitabbaṃ sabbaṃ jānāti eva. Na hi padesañāṇe ^a^M3.0354^ea^ ṭhito jānitabbaṃ sabbaṃ jānāti. Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena hi avisesaggahaṇena ca ‘‘jāna’’nti iminā niravasesaṃ ñeyyajātaṃ pariggayhatīti tabbisayāya jānanakiriyāya sabbaññutaññāṇameva karaṇaṃ bhavituṃ yuttaṃ, pakaraṇavasena ‘‘bhagavā’’ti saddantarasannidhānena ca ayamattho vibhāvetabbo. ^b^Passitabbameva passatī^eb^ti dibbacakkhupaññācakkhudhammacakkhubuddhacakkhusamantacakkhusaṅkhātehi ñāṇacakkhūhi passitabbaṃ passati eva. Atha vā ^b^jānaṃ jānātī^eb^ti yathā aññe savipallāsā kāmarūpapariññāvādino jānantāpi vipallāsavasena jānanti, na evaṃ bhagavā. Bhagavā pana pahīnavipallāsattā jānanto jānāti eva, diṭṭhidassanassa abhāvā passanto passatiyevāti attho. ^b^Cakkhu viya bhūto^eb^ti dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhena cakkhu viya bhūto. Yathā hi cakkhu sattānaṃ dassanatthaṃ pariṇeti sādheti, evaṃ lokassa yāthāvadassanasādhanatopi dassanakiccapariṇāyakaṭṭhena cakkhu viya bhūto, paññācakkhumayattā vā sayambhuñāṇena paññācakkhuṃ bhūto pattoti vā cakkhubhūto.

[03]^b^Ñāṇasabhāvo^eb^ti viditakaraṇaṭṭhena ñāṇasabhāvo. Aviparītasabhāvaṭṭhena pariyattidhammappavattanato vā hadayena cintetvā vācāya nicchāritadhammamayoti ^b^dhammabhūto^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dhammasabhāvo’’^eb^ti. Dhammā vā bodhipakkhiyā tehi uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanato, anaññasādhāraṇaṃ vā dhammaṃ patto adhigatoti ^b^dhammabhūto^eb^. Seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmabhūtoti āha ^b^‘‘seṭṭhasabhāvo’’^eb^ti. Atha vā brahmā vuccati maggo, tena uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanato, tañca sayambhuñāṇena pattoti ^b^brahmabhūto^eb^. Catusaccadhammaṃ vadatīti ^b^vattā^eb^. Ciraṃ saccappaṭivedhaṃ pavattento vadatīti ^b^pavattā. Atthaṃ nīharitvā^eb^ti dukkhādiatthaṃ tatthāpi pīḷanādiatthaṃ uddharitvā. Paramatthaṃ vā nibbānaṃ pāpayitā ^b^ninnetā^eb^. Amatādhigamapaṭipattidesanāya amatasacchikiriyaṃ sattesu uppādento amataṃ dadātīti ^b^amatassa dātā^eb^. Bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ tadāyattabhāvato ^b^dhammasāmī^eb^. Catutthe natthi vattabbaṃ.

[03]^b^117-154^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^a^V3.0330^ea^^a^M3.0355^ea^^b^appakā^eb^ti thokā, na bahū. ^b^Athāyaṃ itarā pajā^eb^ti yā panāyaṃ avasesā pajā sakkāyadiṭṭhitīrameva anudhāvati, ayameva bahutarāti attho. ^b^Sammadakkhāte^eb^ti sammā akkhāte sukathite. ^b^Dhamme^eb^ti tava desanādhamme. ^b^Dhammānuvattino^eb^ti taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tadanucchavikaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūretvā maggaphalasacchikaraṇena dhammānuvattino. ^b^Maccuno ṭhānabhūta^eb^nti kilesamārasaṅkhātassa maccuno nivāsaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ. ^b^Suduttaraṃ taritvā pāramessantī^eb^ti ye janā dhammānuvattino, te etaṃ suduttaraṃ duratikkamaṃ māradheyyaṃ taritvā atikkamitvā nibbānapāraṃ gamissanti.

[03]^b^Kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ vippahāyā^eb^ti kāyaduccaritādibhedaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ jahitvā. ^b^Sukkaṃ bhāvethā^eb^ti paṇḍito bhikkhu abhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā kāyasucaritādibhedaṃ sukkaṃ dhammaṃ bhāveyya. ^b^Okā anokamāgammā^eb^ti okaṃ vuccati ālayo, anokaṃ vuccati anālayo. Ālayato nikkhamitvā anālayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ paṭicca ārabbha.

[03]^b^Tatrābhiratimiccheyyā^eb^ti yasmiṃ anālayasaṅkhāte viveke nibbāne imehi sattehi durabhiramaṃ, tatrābhiratimiccheyya. ^b^Duvidhepi kāme^eb^ti vatthukāmakilesakāme. ^b^Cittaklesehī^eb^ti pañcahi nīvaraṇehi ^b^attānaṃ pariyodapeyya^eb^ vodāpeyya, parisodheyyāti attho.

[03]^b^Sambodhiyaṅgesū^eb^ti sambojjhaṅgesu. ^b^Sammā cittaṃ subhāvita^eb^nti sammā hetunā nayena cittaṃ suṭṭhu bhāvitaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. ^b^Jutimanto^eb^ti ānubhāvavanto, arahattamaggañāṇajutiyā khandhādibhede dhamme jotetvā ṭhitāti attho. ^b^Te loke parinibbutā^eb^ti te imasmiṃ khandhādiloke parinibbutā nāma arahattappattito paṭṭhāya kilesavaṭṭassa khepitattā saupādisesena, carimacittanirodhena khandhavaṭṭassa khepitattā anupādisesena cāti dvīhi parinibbānehi parinibbutā, anupādāno viya padīpo apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gatāti attho.
[06]Ito paraṃ yāva tatiyo paṇṇāsako, tāva uttānatthameva.

[03]^b^167-210^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ca paṭhamādīni uttānatthāni. Dasame ^b^pacchābhūmivāsino^eb^ti paccantadesavāsino. ^b^Sevālamālikā^eb^ti pātova udakaṃ orohitvā sevālañceva uppalādīni ca gahetvā attano udakasuddhikabhāvajānanatthañceva ‘‘lokassa ca udakena suddhi hotī’’ti imassa atthassa jānanatthañca mālaṃ katvā pilandhanakā. ^b^Udakorohakā^eb^ti pāto majjhanhe sāyanhe ca udakaorohaṇakā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sāyatatiyakaṃ udakorohaṇānuyogamanuyuttā’’^eb^ti. Ekādasamādīni uttānatthāni. Catutthe paṇṇāsake natthi vattabbaṃ.

[03]^b^211-746^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcamassa paṭhamādīni uttānatthāni. Navame yasmiṃ santāne kāmāvacarakammaṃ mahaggatakammañca katūpacitaṃ vipākadāne laddhāvasaraṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ, tesu kāmāvacarakammaṃ itaraṃ nīharitvā sayaṃ tattha ṭhatvā attano vipākaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti, mahaggatakammameva ^a^V3.0332^ea^ pana itaraṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākaṃ dātuṃ sakkoti garubhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘taṃ mahogho parittaṃ udakaṃ viyā’’^eb^tiādi. Ito paraṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
